p: Prediction of potential N-glycosylation sites (amino acid series: Asparagine -X-Serine/Threonine, where X stands for any amino acid except Aspartate or Proline) in the HA1 domain of hemagglutinin protein was carried out using the online NetNGlyc 1.0 server [ 39]. A score cut-off value of > 0.5 was considered suggestive of glycosylation.
